Pre-Game Insights: The Denver Nuggets and LA Clippers were tied at two games each in their season series.
Key Match Events: Russell Westbrook had a viral moment during the game when he got a putback rebound after telling his former teammate Ivica Zubac that he would get the rebound.
Post-Match Reflections: Russell Westbrook explained how the moment went down after the game.
Others: Russell Westbrook finished the game with 19 points, eight assists, and six rebounds.
